column4: hi all, does anyone know how to install an downloaded deb package?
I thought apt-get is the tool, hence could not figure out how
lol apt can install things as well, but it's more of a repository/package tracking/searching/updating/installing tool
I still don't understand what is the boundary between apt and dpkg
there are probably 5 different ways to install programs with debian... dpkg, dselect, apt, apt-get, aptitude, synaptic
after so long now I found Ubuntu
synaptic is a program that can handle just about all that... it's a frontend in your desktop... very nice
